EmailTemplate.subject: You Are Invited: Brookfield Private Dinner - Milken Institute Global Conference 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Brookfield | You are Invited
Milken Institute Global Conference 2017
Thank you for joining us for our Private Dinner hosted by Bruce Flatt, CEO, and Barry Blattman, Vice Chairman. We had a great time!!
Look forward to seeing you soon!
